es.ull.datamining.core

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ull.datamining.core.Value
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NominalValue, NumericValue

    public abstract class Value
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract values. All schemes for numeric or nominal values extend this class.
    Author:
    Ivan Steven Ramirez Ladino (alu0100537321@ull.edu.es)
